about_the_game:
This DLC of Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 is a character collaboration with our new game Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya, an expansion pack of character Mystia Lorelei.

We recommend you get this DLC for free by playing the game for 120 minutes.

Mystia is now a playable character in TBC2! Just talk to her in game and you will receive the activation mission, and after 2 hours of playtime, you can receive the activation for her.

If you encounter any problem in the activation process, you can email
langqiaoemeng@qq.com
And we will solve it for you ASAP

Alternatively, if you don’t want to participate in the collaboration, you can always purchase the DLC available at the store page.

Have fun playing!
detailed_description:
Important!

We recommend you get this DLC for free by playing the game for 120 minutes.


About the Game

This DLC of Touhou Blooming Chaos 2 is a character collaboration with our new game Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya, an expansion pack of character Mystia Lorelei. We recommend you get this DLC for free by playing the game for 120 minutes. Mystia is now a playable character in TBC2! Just talk to her in game and you will receive the activation mission, and after 2 hours of playtime, you can receive the activation for her. If you encounter any problem in the activation process, you can email langqiaoemeng@qq.com And we will solve it for you ASAP Alternatively, if you don’t want to participate in the collaboration, you can always purchase the DLC available at the store page. Have fun playing!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7及以上
  • Processor: Intel i3及以上/AMD r3及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 至少1G显存(支持DX11的显卡)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7及以上
  • Processor: Intel i3 8100及以上/AMD Ryzen 3 1200及以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750Ti及以上/AMD Radeon R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Mystia Lorelei’s expansion pack is a collaboration with our new game Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya, you will be able to use Mystia Lorelei in game.We recommend you get this DLC for free by playing the game for 120 minutes.
